Articles.Content:
removed

**Edited <time datetime="2015-08-20T13:24:27Z" title="08/20/2015 01:24  PM" data-short="8 yr">August 20, 2015</time> by Jebby2**
There's a memorial to the original MK1 command pod next to the VAB, I say it looks close enough to the original.
[What not to suggest;](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/36863-What-not-to-suggest) The Universe; Line 4; New easter eggs.

Why them? Why not one to the 7 dead of Challenger, or Columbia? or the 3 of Soyuz 11? All those arguable did much more than whoever that Gus guy is.

See how that can be spun? Best option is to include none.

> 
> Why them? Why not one to the 7 dead of Challenger, or Columbia? or the 3 of Soyuz 11? All those arguable did much more than whoever that Gus guy is.
> See how that can be spun? Best option is to include none.

I agree with you a memorial for just White, Chafee and Grissom is not a good idea. If there is ever going to be another memorial easter egg it should be a generic one.

What I don't get is that you don't know who Gus Grissom was. He was the second American to ever fly in space and the first to fly in space twice.

We have Gus Kerman and a joke about him in Admin building.

Maybe for more humans?

> 
> [What not to suggest;](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/36863-What-not-to-suggest) The Universe; Line 4; New easter eggs.

As always, a fun idea is either out of scope or "already suggested but we're planning it".

> 
> We have Gus Kerman and a joke about him in Admin building.
> Maybe for more humans?

A joke in bad taste I might add, it's about the fire.
